question: Biden removed via 25th Amendment?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden is formally removed from the office of the President of the United States by means of the process outlined in Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to the US Constitution by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the Vice President becomes Acting President via the process outlined in Section 3 of the 25th Amendment, it will not effect the resolution of this market. Only Biden's removal from office via the process outlined in Section 4 of the 25th Amendment will qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

If Biden ceases to be POTUS before this market's expiration date for any other reason, this market may immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government.

question: Trump’s latest TikTok >30m views by Friday?
description:
On July 21, @realdonaldtrump made his fourth TikTok post (https://www.tiktok.com/@realdonaldtrump/video/7393869869361466654).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump's fourth TikTok video reaches 30 million views by July 26, 2024 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Views can be seen by going to Trump's TikTok page https://www.tiktok.com/@realdonaldtrump/.

The resolution source will be the official view count for Trump's first TikTok as displayed on Trump's TikTok account.

events.title: Trump’s latest TikTok >30m views by Friday?

question: Will Tim Ryan be the 2024 Democratic VP nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Tim Ryan is the 2024 nominee of the Democratic Party for U.S. vice president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democrat sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

events.title: Democratic VP nominee?
events.description: This is a market on the selection of the Democratic vice presidential nominee for the upcoming election.

question: Will Joe Biden make an appearance by Wednesday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if US President Joe Biden makes a new public or digital appearance between July 22, 12:00 AM ET, and July 24, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

A public appearance includes for example Biden descending the steps from Air Force One, or an appearance at a press conference. A digital appearance must be verified as new, authentic footage (not AI-generated). For example, if Biden appears in a new prerecorded speech, this market will resolve to "Yes".

Biden must be awake for this market to resolve to "Yes".

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Will Joe Biden make an appearance by Wednesday?

question: Will RFK Jr. drop out before September?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Robert F. Kennedy Jr. officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from the 2024 US presidential race by 11:59 PM ET on August 31, 2024.

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Kennedy from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

If Kennedy does not announce his withdrawal or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race by the specified time, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from RFK Jr. or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Ryan Selkis tweet Jul 23 - Aug 31?
description:
On April 26 the Ryan Selkis (@twobitidiot) posted that “Today is going to be my last day on Twitter until the Fall. 40 days in the desert” (see https://x.com/twobitidiot/status/1815344838499553764).

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ryan Selkis (@twobitidiot) posts/tweets again between July 23, 2024, 8:00 AM ET, and Aug 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Posts include any post, repost, or reply.

The resolution source for this market is https://x.com/twobitidiot.

events.title: Will Ryan Selkis tweet Jul 23 - Aug 31?

question: Will Kamala say "coconut" before August?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris publicly mentions the word "coconut" between July 23, 7:00 PM ET and July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word "coconut".
-Any written usage of the word "coconut" published through Kamala's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@KamalaHarris and @VP, would qualify however @KamalaHQ will not count).

Videos posted on her social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

The resolution source for this market will be footage of Kamala Harris taken within the mentioned timeframe, as well as official communications from Kamala Harris.

events.title: Will Kamala say "coconut" before August?

question: Kamala president by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Kamala president by Friday?

question: Will Netanyahu meet with Biden?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Benjamin Netanyahu meets with Joe Biden during his visit to the United States scheduled for the week of July 22, 2024. If it is confirmed that Netanyahu has left the U.S. without meeting with Biden this market will resolve to "No".

A meeting is defined as any encounter where both Netanyahu and Joe Biden are present and interact with each other in person.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Will Netanyahu meet with Biden?

question: Biden seen in public today?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if US President Joe Biden is seen in public while awake at any time on July 23, 2024, from 12:00 AM ET to 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

A public appearance includes, for example, Biden descending the steps from Air Force One or an appearance at a press conference. Digital appearances including live broadcasts will not count for this market.

The resolution source for this market will be photographic or digital evidence verified by a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Biden seen in public today?

question: 1,000+ Delta flight cancelations today?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if there are 1,000 or more Delta flight cancellations on July 23, 2024, EDT according to FlightAware. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be the number of cancelations listed for Delta, found in the left table on https://www.flightaware.com/live/cancelled/today for July 23, EDT as of 11:59 PM EDT on July 23.  Subsequent changes to the figure for July 23 or the methodology by which FlightAware derives its numbers will have no bearing on the outcome for this market.

events.title: 1,000+ Delta flight cancelations today?

question: Will Trump post on X again before election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @realDonaldTrump posts/tweets again, between July 22 and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts/tweets count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts/retweets will not count.

The resolution source for this market will be Donald J. Trump's verified X/Twitter account: https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump.

Please note, only the @realDonaldTrump verified X/Twitter account counts for this market, regardless of the URL for this profile. If Donald J. Trump posts/tweets from another account, it has no bearing on the resolution of this market.

question: Will Biden's withdrawal speech be live?
description:
Today it was announced that Joe Biden will give a speech about his withdrawal from the 2024 US Presidential election on July 24.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if that speech is delivered live. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

"Live" means the delivered speech is not prerecorded, but broadcast to its audience as Biden delivers it (live broadcast with delays counts as live).

If this speech is cancelled, or Biden does not deliver such a speech by July 24, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be information from the US government and a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Will Biden's withdrawal speech be live?

question: Will Biden resign during his speech today?
description:
Today it was announced that Joe Biden will give a speech about his withdrawal from the 2024 US Presidential election on July 24.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden resigns the US Presidency, or announces he will resign the US Presidency, during that speech. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Biden announces he will resign it will be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" regardless of whether he later resigns.

If this speech is cancelled, or Biden does not deliver such a speech by July 24, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be information from the US government and a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Will Biden resign during his speech today?

question: Will Biden say "Obama" during drop out speech?
description:
Joe Biden is scheduled to give a speech Wednesday July 24, about his decision to end his reelection campaign. This market refers to anything Biden says during the first speech he gives addressing his decision to withdraw from the Presidential race.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden says "Obama". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Biden does not give a speech addressing his decision to withdraw from the Presidential race by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "Obama" is part of the compound word and refers to any Obama (e.g. "Obamacare" counts).

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

events.title: What will Biden say during drop out speech?

question: Biden appoints a man as Secret Service Director?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the next director of the United States Secret Service nominated or appointed by Joe Biden after Kimberly A. Cheatle is a man. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The appointment of an acting director will not count toward the resolution of this market. This market's resolution is based on the next Biden-nominated permanently appointed director of the USSS, regardless of whether they are actually confirmed into the role.

If Biden permanently leaves the US Presidency before he can nominate or appoint the next permanently appointed director of the USSS, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market is official information from the US government.
